section_description:
TAD:
https://company-wiki.example.com/spaces/EN/pages/2932638057/QA+Plan+Offline+mode

- Currently fully rolled out to iOS users 
- Targeting Android users via experiment: `mobile_offline_mode_feature`
title: Offline mode: Error display for non-offline enabled screens

custom_steps_separated.content: Having your device connected to the internet open the pro app

Now go offline and navigate to the Earnings or Profile tab

(Or any other UI that is not enabled for offline mode)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Error screen should be visible but you should be able to go back to already loaded content
